title: Building a LEGO Luigi set with Ro!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Oh, boy is this an exciting unboxing? So the Lego Super Mario Lego kits, are honestly like a dream come true from my childhood. And I actually got to make a dream video come true where I turned my entire living room into a Super Mario Lego course like it's the coolest thing ever. If you guys missed that video I'll put a link in the description. But I just wanted to quickly show you guys the new, Luigi Starter Course you basically need one of these starter courses. But then from there you can expand into all of these expansion sets. And there are so many. This is one that I was very excited to check out. This is Bowser's Airship. This is going to be so fun to build. And now they release Luigi. You can actually team up for new adventures. So you can connect them together to play with a friend. There's a pink Yoshi in this starter course. No way. Oh, that makes me so happy. So cool. My favorite thing about these sets is that it connects to an app. So you do all of your building there and it's cool because it's all 3D. So you can kind of spin your little bricks around and you can see where things are supposed to be placed. Here's Luigi's little body. Oh, there he is, look at him. Look at him. Look at him. That is so cool. Are batteries included? Because- Is this is going to fit in there? Yes. - [Luigi Toy] Lego Luigi time! - Ah! Lego Luigi time! Here's his little pants his hat his ears. His suspenders. He's all set. Look how cool. (Lego Luigi beeps) - He got dizzy. Okay. Lego Luigi is super cool. Now let's open up Mario. Here he is. - You look great, Mario. (toys beep) God, I'm so excited about this. Like honestly, I oh, it's going to be so cool. Have you seen the Lego Mario? Like the actual Lego sets? - Well, I've seen them online, not in person. - Well, guess what? There is now a player two. And they have a Lego Luigi. - No! - So I already did the unboxing already. - Okay. - So here's the Lego Luigi and here's Lego Mario and I'd love that they like, okay like Luigi's a little bit taller but like he's barely, barely taller. - Luigi is taller. I really appreciate that. It's just like a little bit more but he is taller. - So I already started this video. That's why they're - Look at this! - They're in these pre-packaged Ziploc bags. This is going to be so much fun because the best part about this is you can actually link this to an app. And you know how like old school Lego sets you used to have to actually use the paper instructions? - Yes, yes. - No, you link this up now to the app and you can go through step-by-step and you build the sets virtually. And this entire Lego Mario universe is really expansive. Like there's tons of sets, but to do all of it you have to have the starter pack. - And this is it? - This is it. - This is the starter. - Okay. And what's so great about this app like, check this out. We just like, go through and it'll give you all of the pieces, digitally. Like, look how much- - This is awesome. - Easier this is. Okay. Oh, this makes it a lot easier. - So much easier. So there's these little QR type code things here which are really cool because this is how Mario and Luigi know what enemy this is. - This symbol? - Yeah, it just scans it. So check this out. - Oh. (Lego Luigi beeping) - And you get coins. - The noise. - I know! So now we need to put the pipe together. - Oh, I did this wrong. It's okay. - Then green. - Okay. Here we go. - Put it on the sides. (Lego Mario snoring) - He's tired. - It's motion activated too. So like it'll, it can tell whenever you move it and stuff. There's so many different steps. So this is the flag. And I think we just jam that in there. Let me just snap the flag on. - Look at that. - So we have our start and end. So here it's showing you how to do it. So they've got a little connector thing here. So this is kind of a super basic course. So we're going to start with this. Look, they have little flowers. You can make little flowers. - Oh my gosh, I want to make one! - Yeah, this is cool. - Oh my gosh. These are so cute. Oh, where do I put them? - You can put them wherever, really. - Boop. - Okay. Yoshi has a lot of parts. Yoshi has a lot of parts, and then we put Yoshi body. So Yoshi is all put together. Now, it's great because all of the stuff obviously works together.
